snippet: The actor said his book would “tell the stories of my life and reveal the secrets and lies that I lived with for six years shooting ‘Breaking Bad.’ ”
abstract: Veteran actor Bryan Cranston plans to write memoir of his life and work; book, which will be published by Simon & Schuster imprint Scribner, is scheduled for release in fall 2015.
lead_paragraph: The actor said his book would “tell the stories of my life and reveal the secrets and lies that I lived with for six years shooting ‘Breaking Bad.’ ”

headline.main: Bryan Cranston to Write Memoir of His ‘Breaking Bad’ Years
